docs.title: JS2PySecrets
docs.text: This is a Python implementation of Shamir's threshold secret sharing scheme, based and compatible with the JavaScript fork of secrets.js maintained by grempe. Which is orginally based on the code created by amper5and on Github. The original secrets.js can be found there.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.

  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

  • mkdocs-material

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

Phasellus posuere in sem ut cursus
